biotools.summary: The Bayesian Hierarchical Model named Neoantgien-T cell interaction estimation (Netie) is developed to investigate the neoantigens observed in the patient tumors to estimate the history of the impact of the host immune pressure on the evolution of the tumor clones. The estimation results will reveal whether the host immune system has been conferring strong or weaker selection pressure on the tumor clones over the time of tumor development. This may give us a peak into the future of how the mutations and clones will evolve for that patient. The model is based on pyclone/sciclone/phylowgs estimation results.

bioschemas.name: netie
